name: Gaslighting and Brainwashing Defense
description: Techniques to recognize and neutralize psychological gaslighting and mind control attempts.

cards.title: Recognizing Gaslighting Techniques
cards.description: Identifying signs of gaslighting in conversations and relationships.
cards.bulletpoints: Notice denial of past statements, contradiction loops, and forced self-doubt

cards.title: Breaking Brainwashing Cycles
cards.description: Methods to reverse psychological conditioning from manipulative influences.
cards.bulletpoints: Deconstruct false narratives, strengthen personal reality anchors, avoid isolation effects
